# CKContainer.ApplicationPermissionStatus.initialState

**Case**

The app is yet to request the permission.

## Declaration

```swift
case initialState
```

## Permission Statuses

- **CKContainer.ApplicationPermissionStatus.couldNotComplete**: An error that occurs while processing the permission request.
- **CKContainer.ApplicationPermissionStatus.denied**: The user denies the permission.
- **CKContainer.ApplicationPermissionStatus.granted**: The user grants the permission.

items.description: An error that occurs while processing the permission request.
